SELECT t.id, t.staff_name, t.staff_code, t.BEGIN_DATE, t.END_DATE, t.COMPANY_NAME, t.ORG_NAME, t.POST, t.MAIN_PERFORMANCE, t.ROLE, t.SUBORDINATES, t.BACKGROUND_CHECKS, CONCAT( t.modifier_name, " 于 ", t.MODIFIED_TIME, " 更新" ) updateDesc, t.staff_id, t.group_id, t.GROUP_NAME from ( SELECT f.id, s.staff_name, s.staff_code, f.BEGIN_DATE, f.END_DATE, f.COMPANY_NAME, f.ORG_NAME, f.POST, f.MAIN_PERFORMANCE, f.ROLE, f.SUBORDINATES, f.BACKGROUND_CHECKS, f.modifier_name, f.MODIFIED_TIME, f.staff_id, g.ID group_id, g.GROUP_NAME FROM mp_workexperience f LEFT JOIN mp_staff s ON s.ID = f.STAFF_id LEFT JOIN mp_userpost up ON s.USER_ID = up.USER_ID and up.MAIN_POST=1 LEFT JOIN mp_post p ON p.ID = up.POST_ID LEFT JOIN mp_group g on p.GROUP_ID=g.ID LEFT JOIN mp_organization o ON up.ORG_DEPT_ID = o.ID where f.DEL_FLAG = 0
and p.GROUP_ID = #{query.groupId}
AND o.ORG_CODE like (select CONCAT(org.ORG_CODE,'%') from mp_organization org where org.id=#{orgId} limit 1)
ORDER BY f.CREATED_TIME desc )t
and CONCAT( IFNULL(t.staff_name,''), IFNULL(t.staff_code,''), IFNULL(t.BEGIN_DATE,''),IFNULL(t.END_DATE,''), IFNULL(t.COMPANY_NAME,'') , IFNULL(t.ORG_NAME,''), IFNULL(t.POST,'') ,IFNULL(t.MAIN_PERFORMANCE,''), IFNULL(t.ROLE,'') ,IFNULL(t.SUBORDINATES,''),IFNULL(t.BACKGROUND_CHECKS,''), IFNULL(t.modifier_name,''),IFNULL(t.MODIFIED_TIME,'') ) LIKE concat('%',#{searchText},'%')

SELECT t.id, t.staff_name, t.staff_code, t.BEGIN_DATE, t.END_DATE, t.COMPANY_NAME, t.ORG_NAME, t.POST, t.MAIN_PERFORMANCE, t.ROLE, t.SUBORDINATES, t.BACKGROUND_CHECKS, CONCAT( t.modifier_name, " 于 ", t.MODIFIED_TIME, " 更新" ) updateDesc from ( SELECT f.id, s.staff_name, s.staff_code, f.BEGIN_DATE, f.END_DATE, f.COMPANY_NAME, f.ORG_NAME, f.POST, f.MAIN_PERFORMANCE, f.ROLE, f.SUBORDINATES, f.BACKGROUND_CHECKS, f.modifier_name, f.MODIFIED_TIME FROM mp_workexperience f LEFT JOIN mp_staff s ON s.ID = f.STAFF_id where 1=1 and f.DEL_FLAG = 0
and f.staff_id = #{staffId}
ORDER BY f.CREATED_TIME desc )t where 1=1
and CONCAT( IFNULL(t.staff_name,''), IFNULL(t.staff_code,''), IFNULL(t.BEGIN_DATE,''),IFNULL(t.END_DATE,''), IFNULL(t.COMPANY_NAME,'') , IFNULL(t.ORG_NAME,''), IFNULL(t.POST,'') ,IFNULL(t.MAIN_PERFORMANCE,''), IFNULL(t.ROLE,'') ,IFNULL(t.SUBORDINATES,''),IFNULL(t.BACKGROUND_CHECKS,''), IFNULL(t.modifier_name,''),IFNULL(t.MODIFIED_TIME,'') ) LIKE concat('%',#{searchText},'%')
